analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/37/0x679e37cc79e3ff5a99bb229eee9af9869ef20762.sol:
	Contract GameInvestToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/37/0x679e37cc79e3ff5a99bb229eee9af9869ef20762.sol#192-193)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/37/0x679e37cc79e3ff5a99bb229eee9af9869ef20762.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.23 (/unique_chucks/37/0x679e37cc79e3ff5a99bb229eee9af9869ef20762.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/37/0x679e37cc79e3ff5a99bb229eee9af9869ef20762.sol#60-62) is not in mixedCase
